title: Is that what Carl Sagan said "Forebodding of a America"?
subtitle: A quote from the 1995 book of the late astronomer and scientific caller Carl Sagan hit nerves with some readers decades later.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Karl Sagan once predicted the future risks of the United States, where "the major manufacturing industries have descended into other countries," where "people have lost their ability to set their own agendas or to question power in an informed way" and "no one can represent the public interest until they understand the issues."
